overview_of_class:
This course treats central concepts in cognitive psychology and cognitive
science, including causal thinking, reasoning, mathematics, and conceptions
of everyday objects.
name: Reasoning and Representation
title: WCAS PSYCH 461-0-20 Reasoning and Representation
